A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Fan-boy hate is misguided.  This is a very good movie and honors the legacy of Star Wars.  Listen to the critics this time\, not the audience.  The audience score is a 2017-internet-troll engineered fraud.  Cinemascore has this as an A.  Enjoy this movie\, once if not more than once\, and take every chance you can to yell down to the basement to your favourite fan-boy and tell him how much you loved it.
